headline: How Does Exxon Mobil’s Majnoon Oil Field Move Impact Its 2025 Stock Value?
summary: If you have been eyeing Exxon Mobil and wondering whether now is the right time to buy, hold, or cash out, you are not alone. The energy giant has been making quiet but significant moves lately that are catching many investors’ attention. Over the last week, shares have nudged up by 1.5% and posted a modest 2.0% rise over the past month. Year to date, the stock has managed a steady 5.2% gain, though it is still clawing back from a 5.0% dip over the last year. Long-term holders, however, have...
